00049 //
00050 // LocalQueryServer
00051 //
00052 // 15 March 2004 -- tds
00053 //
00054 // Allows a QueryEnvironment to run queries against a
00055 // local connection (without doing a network hop).
00056 // This is especially useful for testing.
00057 //
00058 
00059 #ifndef INDRI_LOCALQUERYSERVER_HPP
00060 #define INDRI_LOCALQUERYSERVER_HPP
00061 
00062 #include "indri/QueryServer.hpp"
00063 #include "indri/Collection.hpp"
00064 #include "indri/Repository.hpp"
00065 #include "indri/DocumentVector.hpp"
00066 #include "indri/ListCache.hpp"
00067 
00068 class LocalQueryServer : public QueryServer {
00069 private:
00070   Repository& _repository;
00071   ListCache _cache;
00072 
00073 public:
00074   LocalQueryServer( Repository& repository );
00075 
00076   // query
00077   QueryServerResponse* runQuery( std::vector<indri::lang::Node*>& roots, int resultsRequested, bool optimize );
00078 
00079   // single document queries
00080   ParsedDocument* document( int documentID );
00081   std::string documentMetadatum( int documentID, const std::string& attributeName );
00082 
00083   // batch queries
00084   QueryServerDocumentsResponse* documents( const std::vector<int>& documentIDs );
00085   QueryServerMetadataResponse* documentMetadata( const std::vector<int>& documentIDs, const std::string& attributeName );
00086 
00087   // terms
00088   INT64 termCount();
00089   INT64 termCount( int term );
00090   INT64 termCount( const std::string& term );
00091   INT64 stemCount( const std::string& stem );
00092   std::string termName( int term );
00093   int termID( const std::string& term );
00094   
00095   // fields
00096   std::vector<std::string> fieldList();
00097   INT64 termFieldCount( int term, const std::string& field );
00098   INT64 termFieldCount( const std::string& term, const std::string& field );
00099   INT64 stemFieldCount( const std::string& stem, const std::string& field );
00100 
00101   // documents
00102   int documentLength( int documentID );
00103   INT64 documentCount();
00104   INT64 documentCount( const std::string& term );
00105 
00106   // vector
00107   QueryServerVectorsResponse* documentVectors( const std::vector<int>& documentIDs );
00108 };
00109 
00110 #endif // INDRI_LOCALQUERYSERVER_HPP
